short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: The Genius.AI extension allows you to bring the power of the AI in the DMs of your favorite social media platform.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Genius.AI is an AI-Based Business Enablement Platform powered by an AI that learns about your brand and your products and creates copy in your tone of voice.

The Genius.AI extension allows Genius.AI users to bring their own AI directly into the their existing social media inboxes. The AI will look at the conversation and suggest you how to communicate to your prospects in order to close a sale.

The extension connects directly into your Genius.AI account so all of the learnings about your products and personality is there waiting for you on your preferred social media platform!

The extension today supports Facebook (https://www.facebook.com/messages), Instagram, LinkedIn and WhatsApp with more coming soon!

Want to learn more about Genius.AI? Visit https://genius.ai

### VERSION 1.7 ###
* Fixed a bug that prevented WhatsApp Messages to work correctly.

### VERSION 1.6 ###
* Fixed a bug that prevented all the products to be seen.

### VERSION 1.5 ###
* Fixed a bug that prevented the product information to be taken into consideration by the AI Suggestions

### VERSION 1.4 ###
* Fixed a bug on Instagram which caused Genius.AI to remain open outside of the DM page

### VERSION 1.3 ###
* Added support for the German, French, Italian, Spanish and Portuguese version of Facebook
* Added support for the French, German, Italian, Spanish version of WhatsApp Web
